entries.title: Tesla Stock Headed for Its Worst Year on Record
entries.description: Elon Musk’s electric-vehicle maker has shed more than $700 billion in market valuation in 2022.

entries.title: Huawei Says It Is Out of 'Crisis Mode' as Annual Revenue Stabilized
entries.description: Despite punishing U.S. restrictions, Huawei it reported growth in its telecom infrastructure business and flat overall revenue for 2022.
